com.castlabs.android.utils

Class AssetsUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.castlabs.android.utils.AssetsUtils

  • public class AssetsUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Asset utilities that help to copy assets from the application to a local folder.
    Since:
    2.0.0
